pyramid.plunder

Class Snake

  • java.lang.Object
    • pyramid.plunder.Drawable
      • pyramid.plunder.GameObject
        • pyramid.plunder.PhysicsObject
          • pyramid.plunder.Player
            • pyramid.plunder.NPC
              • pyramid.plunder.Snake

  • public class Snake
extends NPC
    This Snake Class extends the NPC; the random locations and characteristics of sprite images, health, armor, speed, attack, moveAtRest, and jump are implemented in the game.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Snake(int locX, int locY)
      The Snake is passed down locX and locY, which are used to define the location of the Mummy.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Snake

        public Snake(int locX,
     int locY)
        The Snake is passed down locX and locY, which are used to define the location of the Mummy. The size is also defined.
